text: Renê Carmo Kreuz Weber (16 July 1961 – 16 December 2020), was a Brazilian football player and manager. He was born in Roque Gonzales, Rio Grande do Sul. In 1986, he played for the national team. He mainly played for Fluminense and Vitória. On 16 December 2020, Weber died in Rio de Janeiro at the age of 59 from COVID-19. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian football managers Category:Footballers from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Renê Weber
